TEXT.S: Guangfu mki sku Hualien. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 131.63 km (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 28.44 km , rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 5.67 km ), 10,741 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 3,865 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 6,982 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 65 . kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Guangfu ays psgayun 14 ru 9 alang. 9 alang hani ga, Tafalong, Fata' an, Laso'ay, Alolong, Sado, Kalotong, O kakay, Atomo, Fahol.
